Title: Hellboy

Title: The Strangers

Description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

Title: Inside Man
Cast: Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer
Description: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

Title: Napoleon Dynamite

Title: Pâfekuto burû

Description: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

Title: Death Proof
Cast: Kurt Russell, Zoë Bell, Rosario Dawson, Vanessa Ferlito
Description: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

Title: Man of Steel
Cast: Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon, Diane Lane
Description: An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.

Title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
Cast: Amandla Stenberg, Maria Bakalova, Myha'la, Rachel Sennott
Description: When a group of rich 20-somethings plan a hurricane party at a remote family mansion, a party game turns deadly.

Title: Freelance

Description: An ex-special forces operative takes a job to provide security for a journalist as she interviews a dictator, but when a military coup breaks out in the middle of the interview, they are forced to escape into the jungle.

Title: Dumb Money

Title: Sonic the Hedgehog

Description: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

Title: The Guest

Title: Dumb and Dumber

Description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

Title: Total Recall
Cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sharon Stone, Michael Ironside, Rachel Ticotin
Description: When a man goes in to have virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars implanted in his mind, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he?

Title: The Abyss
Cast: Ed Harris, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Michael Biehn, Leo Burmester
Description: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

Title: The Tomorrow War
Cast: Chris Pratt, Yvonne Strahovski, J.K. Simmons, Betty Gilpin
Description: A family man is drafted to fight in a future war where the fate of humanity relies on his ability to confront the past.

Title: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
Cast: Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller, Joey Morgan, Sarah Dumont
Description: Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak.

Title: Toy Story
Cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
Description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Title: Caddyshack
Cast: Chevy Chase, Rodney Dangerfield, Bill Murray, Ted Knight
Description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a flatulent new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

Title: Cashback
Cast: Sean Biggerstaff, Emilia Fox, Michelle Ryan, Erica Ellis
Description: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.

Title: Casablanca
Cast: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
Description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Title: Thirteen
Cast: Evan Rachel Wood, Holly Hunter, Nikki Reed, Vanessa Hudgens
Description: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.

Title: In Time

Title: Jurassic World
Cast: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Ty Simpkins, Judy Greer
Description: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

Title: Now You See Me
Cast: Jesse Eisenberg, Common, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson
Description: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

Title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
Cast: Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum, Roy Kinnear
Description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

Title: The Fast and the Furious
Cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster

Title: Beautiful Boy

Title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona

Title: The Mask
Cast: Jim Carrey, Cameron Diaz, Peter Riegert, Peter Greene

Title: Terrifier 2

Title: Atonement

Description: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Cast: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody, Vince Vaughn
Description: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

Title: Sin City
Cast: Quentin Tarantino, Robert Rodriguez, Mickey Rourke, Clive Owen, Bruce Willis, Jessica Alba
Description: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

Title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
Cast: Tilda Swinton, Georgie Henley, William Moseley, Skandar Keynes

Title: Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey
Cast: Nikolai Leon, Maria Taylor, Natasha Rose Mills, Amber Doig-Thorne
Description: After Christopher Robin abandons them for college, Pooh and Piglet embark on a bloody rampage as they search for a new source of food.

Title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Cast: Johnny Depp, Freddie Highmore, David Kelly, Helena Bonham Carter
Description: Charlie, a young boy from an impoverished family, and four other kids win a tour of an amazing chocolate factory run by an imaginative chocolatier, Willy Wonka, and his staff of Oompa-Loompas.

Title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
Cast: Kyle Chandler, Vera Farmiga, Millie Bobby Brown, Ken Watanabe

Title: Knock Knock
Cast: Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo, Ana de Armas, Aaron Burns
Description: A devoted husband and father helps two stranded young women who knock on his door, but his kind gesture turns into a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.

Title: Salinui chueok
Cast: Song Kang-ho, Kim Sang-kyung, Kim Roe-ha, Song Jae-ho
Description: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Cast: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
Description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

Title: Savageland
Cast: Simon Herbert, David Whelan, Heather Moore, Lars Nielsen, J.C. Carlos, Lawrence Ross
Description: When a small town near the Arizona-Mexico border is wiped out overnight, suspicion falls on the lone survivor. But a roll of photos the survivor took that night tells a different story.

Title: Lo imposible
Cast: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Oaklee Pendergast
Description: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

Title: Beauty and the Beast
Cast: Emma Watson, Dan Stevens, Luke Evans, Josh Gad
Description: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

Title: Legend
Cast: Tom Cruise, Mia Sara, Tim Curry, David Bennent
Description: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

Title: Black Hawk Down
Cast: Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore, Eric Bana

Title: Man on Fire
Cast: Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Dakota Fanning, Radha Mitchell
Description: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Title: A Face in the Crowd
Cast: Andy Griffith, Patricia Neal, Anthony Franciosa, Walter Matthau
Description: A female radio reporter turns a folk-singing drifter into a powerful media star.

Title: Trading Places
Cast: Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche
Description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

Title: There Will Be Blood
Cast: Daniel Day-Lewis, Paul Dano, Ciarán Hinds, Martin Stringer

Title: The King

Title: Wrong Turn

Title: The Intouchables

Title: Snack Shack
Cast: Conor Sherry, Gabriel LaBelle, Mika Abdalla, Nick Robinson

Title: Shane

Title: The Predator

Title: Caligola

Title: Strictly Confidential

Title: Out of Darkness

Title: Under the Silver Lake

Title: Lucy

Title: Uncut Gems

Title: Excalibur

Title: Space Jam
Cast: Michael Jordan, Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle, Manner Washington

Title: The Irishman

Title: The Great Escape

Title: Coherence

Title: Matilda

Title: Labyrinth

Title: The Dead Don't Hurt

Title: Finestkind
Cast: Ben Foster, Toby Wallace, Jenna Ortega, Tommy Lee Jones

Title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles

Title: Sing

Title: The Human Centipede (First Sequence)

Title: Kick-Ass 2

Title: The Favourite

Title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure

Title: The Sandlot
Cast: Tom Guiry, Mike Vitar, Art LaFleur, Patrick Renna

Title: Falling Down

Title: La bête
Cast: Léa Seydoux, George MacKay, Guslagie Malanda, Dasha Nekrasova

Title: Spartacus

Title: A Star Is Born
Cast: Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Greg Grunberg
Description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

Title: Magnolia
Cast: Tom Cruise, Jason Robards, Julianne Moore, Philip Seymour Hoffman

Title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes

Title: Cape Fear
Cast: Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange, Juliette Lewis

Title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

Title: Irish Wish

Title: Hack Your Health: The Secrets of Your Gut

Title: Jojo Rabbit

Title: Scary Movie
Cast: Anna Faris, Jon Abrahams, Marlon Wayans, Carmen Electra

Title: Frozen

Title: The Hunt

Title: Curiosa
Cast: Noémie Merlant, Niels Schneider, Benjamin Lavernhe, Camélia Jordana
Description: A passionate love story set against a backdrop of sexual freedom, loosely based on the relationship between 19th-century authors Pierre Louÿs and Marie de Régnier.

Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

Title: Infinity Pool

Title: Conan the Barbarian
Cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, James Earl Jones, Max von Sydow, Sandahl Bergman
Description: A powerful warrior seeks to avenge the genocide of his people and the murder of his parents at the hands of a snake cult.

Title: V for Vendetta
Cast: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves, Stephen Rea

Title: Casino Royale

Description: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

Cast: John Cusack, Thandiwe Newton, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Amanda Peet
Description: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

Title: Moneyball
Cast: Brad Pitt, Robin Wright, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman

Title: The Day After Tomorrow
Cast: Dennis Quaid, Jake Gyllenhaal, Emmy Rossum, Dash Mihok
Description: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

Title: The Incredibles
Cast: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee
Description: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

Title: Terrifier
Cast: Jenna Kanell, Samantha Scaffidi, David Howard Thornton, Catherine Corcoran
Description: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.

Title: The Wolverine
Cast: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto, Rila Fukushima
Description: Wolverine comes to Japan to meet an old friend whose life he saved years ago, and gets embroiled in a conspiracy involving yakuza and mutants.

Title: Let It Be
Cast: John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, Ringo Starr
Description: The filmed account ofThe Beatles' attempt to recapture their old group spirit by making a back-to-basics album, which instead drove them further apart.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1

Description: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

Title: Woody Woodpecker Goes to Camp

Title: Now and Then
Cast: Christina Ricci, Demi Moore, Rosie O'Donnell, Thora Birch
Description: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

Title: C'è ancora domani

Description: Set in postwar 1940s Italy, it follows Delia breaking traditional family patterns and aspiring to a different future, after receiving a mysterious letter.

Title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
Cast: Asa Butterfield, David Thewlis, Rupert Friend, Zac Mattoon O'Brien

Title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels

Description: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

Title: Bone Tomahawk
Cast: Kurt Russell, Patrick Wilson, Matthew Fox, Richard Jenkins

Title: Last Night in Soho

Description: Aspiring fashion designer Eloise is mysteriously able to return to 1960s London, where she encounters dazzling wannabe singer Sandie. But the glamour is not as it seems, and the dreams of the past crack and splinter into something darker.

Title: Wild Things
Cast: Kevin Bacon, Neve Campbell, Matt Dillon, Denise Richards
Description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

Title: Puppy Love

Description: After a disastrous first date, Nicole and Max vow to lose each other's numbers until their dogs find a love match. Hilariously mismatched Nicole and Max are forced to become responsible co-parents, but end up finding love themselves.

Title: Up
Cast: Bob Peterson, Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger, Christopher Plummer
Description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Title: Aladdin
Cast: Will Smith, Mena Massoud, Naomi Scott, Marwan Kenzari

Description: Plot under wraps

Description: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

Title: 2 Hearts
Cast: Jacob Elordi, Adan Canto, Tiera Skovbye, Radha Mitchell
Description: For two couples the future unfolds in different decades and different places, but a hidden connection will bring them together in a way no one could have predicted.

Title: The Secret Life of Pets
Cast: Louis C.K., Eric Stonestreet, Kevin Hart, Lake Bell
Description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

Title: Rocky Balboa
Cast: Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Tarver, Milo Ventimiglia, Burt Young
Description: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

Title: Hidden Strike
Cast: Jackie Chan, John Cena, Chunrui Ma, Wenli Jiang
Description: Two ex-special forces soldiers must escort a group of civilians along Baghdad's "Highway of Death" to the safety of the Green Zone.

Title: Paths of Glory
Cast: Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker, Adolphe Menjou, George Macready
Description: After a failed attack on a German position, a general orders three soldiers, chosen at random, court-martialed for cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Title: Warm Bodies
Cast: Nicholas Hoult, Teresa Palmer, John Malkovich, Lio Tipton
Description: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

Title: The Uninvited
Cast: Elizabeth Reaser, Walton Goggins, Lois Smith, Eva De Dominici
Description: A stranger crashes a party, sparking a comedy of errors, and a reordering of life.

Title: Can't Hardly Wait
Cast: Deborah Kaplan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Ethan Embry, Charlie Korsmo, Lauren Ambrose
Description: A complete graduating class, consisting of beautiful girls, geeks and promising footballers, assemble at a rich classmate's residence for a party. Interesting developments follow at the get-together.

Title: John and the Hole
Cast: Charlie Shotwell, Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Ehle, Taissa Farmiga
Description: A coming-of-age psychological thriller that plays out the unsettling reality of a kid who holds his family captive in a hole in the ground.

Title: Znachor
Cast: Leszek Lichota, Maria Kowalska, Ignacy Liss, Anna Szymanczyk
Description: A once-respected surgeon professor Rafal Wilczur who's lost his family and his memory gets a chance at redemption when he reconnects with someone from his forgotten past who can help him find the answers he needs.

Title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle

Description: After her sex offender husband gets caught in the act and kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against one of her husband's victims and the woman's family.

Title: Living
Cast: Bill Nighy, Aimee Lou Wood, Alex Sharp, Adrian Rawlins
Description: In 1950s London, a humorless bureaucrat decides to take time off work to experience life after receiving a grim diagnosis.

Title: Alive
Cast: Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano, Josh Hamilton, Bruce Ramsay
Description: After crash-landing in the snowswept Andes, a Uruguayan rugby team has no choice but to turn to desperate measures in order to survive.

Title: You Hurt My Feelings
Cast: Amber Tamblyn, David Cross, Tobias Menzies, Julia Louis-Dreyfus
Description: A novelist's longstanding marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband giving his honest reaction to her latest book.

Title: Eat Pray Love
Cast: Julia Roberts, Javier Bardem, Richard Jenkins, Viola Davis
Description: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

Title: Tomorrow Never Dies
Cast: Pierce Brosnan, Jonathan Pryce, Michelle Yeoh, Teri Hatcher
Description: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

Title: Us x Her
Cast: AJ Raval, Angeli Khang, Kiko Estrada, Bob Jbeili
Description: A young couple's shaky marriage becomes more chaotic when an other woman comes into the picture. But what happens when the two women fall in love with each other?

Title: Sahara

Title: Dolittle
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Antonio Banderas, Michael Sheen, Jim Broadbent
Description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

Title: In the Heart of the Sea
Cast: Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy, Brendan Gleeson, Ben Whishaw

Title: Merry Christmas
Cast: Katrina Kaif, Vijay Sethupathi, Tinnu Anand, Pari Sharma
Description: Two strangers meet on a fateful Christmas Eve. A night of delirious romance turns into a nightmare. Revealing anything more would be a crime.

Title: Lights Out
Cast: Teresa Palmer, Gabriel Bateman, Maria Bello, Billy Burke
Description: Rebecca must unlock the terror behind her little brother's experiences that once tested her sanity, bringing her face to face with a supernatural spirit attached to their mother.

Title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles

Title: Bonnie and Clyde
Cast: Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard, Gene Hackman
Description: Bored waitressBonnie Parkerfalls in love with an ex-con namedClyde Barrowand together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

Title: Overlord
Cast: Jovan Adepo, Wyatt Russell, Mathilde Ollivier, Pilou Asbæk

Title: The Lost City of Z

Description: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Major Percival Fawcett, who disappeared whilst searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

Title: Gangster Squad

Title: Goodnight Mommy
Cast: Naomi Watts, Cameron Crovetti, Nicholas Crovetti, Peter Hermann
Description: Twin brothers arrive at their mother's house and begin to suspect that something isn't right.

Title: Where Hope Grows
Cast: Kristoffer Polaha, David DeSanctis, McKaley Miller, Michael Grant
Description: A baseball player whose professional career was cut short due to his personal problems is suddenly awakened and invigorated by a young-man with Down syndrome who works at the local grocery store.

Title: Neighbors
Cast: Seth Rogen, Rose Byrne, Zac Efron, Lisa Kudrow
Description: After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.

Title: The Babysitters
Cast: Lauren Birkell, Paul Borghese, Chira Cassel, Anthony Cirillo
Description: After fooling around with one of her customers, a teenager turns her babysitting service into a call-girl service for married guys.

Title: Final Girl

Title: 20 Days in Mariupol
Cast: Mstyslav Chernov, Evgeniy Maloletka, Liudmyla Amelkina, Roman Golovanov

Title: The Disaster Artist
Cast: James Franco, Dave Franco, Ari Graynor, Seth Rogen

Title: Kung fu

Title: Splice
Cast: Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley, Delphine Chanéac, Brandon McGibbon

Title: Cinderella
Cast: Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske, Ilene Woods, James MacDonald, Eleanor Audley, Verna Felton
Description: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

Title: You're Next
Cast: Sharni Vinson, Joe Swanberg, AJ Bowen, Nicholas Tucci
Description: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

Title: Crakk: Jeetega... Toh Jiyegaa
Cast: Vidyut Jammwal, Arjun Rampal, Nora Fatehi, Amy Jackson
Description: The journey of a man from the slums of Mumbai to the world of underground extreme sports.

Title: Extinction

Title: A través de tu mirada

Title: Day of the Woman
Cast: Camille Keaton, Eron Tabor, Richard Pace, Anthony Nichols

Title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou

Title: The Third Man
Cast: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Trevor Howard

Title: Trauma
Cast: Catalina Martin, Macarena Carrere, Dominga Bofill, Ximena del Solar

Title: Serendipity
Cast: John Cusack, Kate Beckinsale, Jeremy Piven, Bridget Moynahan
Description: A couple search for each other years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

Title: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
Cast: Steve Martin, Rachel Ward, Alan Ladd, Carl Reiner

Title: Män som hatar kvinnor

Description: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

Title: Burn

Title: Paddington 2

Title: Green Street
Cast: Elijah Wood, Charlie Hunnam, Claire Forlani, Marc Warren

Title: Stockholm Bloodbath

Title: Annie

Title: Hush

Title: Colombiana

Title: Eight for Silver

Title: Twins of Evil

Title: The Book of Life

Title: In the Name of the Father

Title: The Long Riders

Title: Violent Night

Title: The Call of the Wild
Cast: Harrison Ford, Omar Sy, Cara Gee, Dan Stevens

Title: Boston Strangler

Title: The Lodge

Title: White Bird

Title: Accepted

Title: Bolt

Title: Army of Darkness

Title: Fool's Paradise

Title: Cherry

Title: The Zookeeper's Wife

Title: Mystic Pizza

Title: The Greatest Beer Run Ever

Title: Popeye

Title: Murder Mubarak

Title: Jesus Revolution

Title: Escape Room: Tournament of Champions

Title: Fright Night

Title: Kol

Title: Ken Park

Title: Pink Flamingos

Title: Life of the Party

Title: A Goofy Movie

Title: Hanna

Title: The Blob

Title: A Night at the Roxbury

Title: Body of Lies

Title: Coach Carter

Title: The King of Comedy

Title: Vision Quest

Title: Miss Sloane

Title: Kate

Title: The Tourist
Cast: Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie, Paul Bettany, Timothy Dalton

Title: Thief
Cast: James Caan, Tuesday Weld, Willie Nelson, Jim Belushi

Title: Hercules

Title: Hitman

Title: Gi-eok-ui bam

Title: The Mission

Title: The Last Starfighter

Title: Videodrome

Title: Never Back Down

Title: Tootsie

Title: Ôdishon

Description: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

Title: Zola
Cast: Taylour Paige, Riley Keough, Nicholas Braun, Ari'el Stachel
Description: A stripper named Zola embarks on a wild road trip to Florida.

Title: Elf
Cast: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Zooey Deschanel

Title: No Exit

Title: Dead Presidents

Description: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

Title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted

Title: Lifeforce

Title: Sleeping with the Enemy

However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

Title: Village of the Damned

Description: Teenage Jeffrey in South Africa aims to lose his virginity before graduating amidst Apartheid, love, politics, and rugby violence.

Title: Bez wstydu

Description: A young man entertains an unhealthy desire for his older and unstable half-sister.

Title: Efter brylluppet

Description: A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

Title: Panic in the Streets

Title: Dracula

Title: The House on Sorority Row

Title: Tall in the Saddle

Title: Between Two Ferns: The Movie
Cast: Zach Galifianakis, Matthew McConaughey, Rekha Shankar, Olivia Mekdara
Description: Zach Galifianakis and his oddball crew take a road trip to complete a series of high-profile celebrity interviews.

Title: Autómata
Cast: Antonio Banderas, Birgitte Hjort Sørensen, Dylan McDermott, Melanie Griffith
Description: Human race is at edge of the end. Robot race is at edge of the beginning.

Title: Los delincuentes

Title: Starship Troopers: Invasion

Title: La caduta degli dei (Götterdämmerung)

Title: Phoenix the Warrior

Title: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood

Title: Electric Dreams

Description: An artificially intelligent PC and his human owner find themselves in a romantic rivalry over a woman.

Title: Blue Steel

Title: Little Fish

Title: Eismayer

Title: Agak Laen

Title: Suze

Title: Ghost Town

Title: Mammal

Title: Por un puñado de besos

Title: Kyûketsuki hantâ D

Title: The Oxford Murders

Title: Exit

Title: Brubaker

Title: Vi

Title: All of Me

Title: Bad Director

Title: Double Team

Title: Carry on Nurse

Title: Beauty Shop

Title: Le meraviglie

Title: My Little Nightmare

Title: Anchiporuno

Title: Curly Sue

Title: The Army of Shadows

Title: Snatchers

Title: Holy Motors

Title: Veer-Zaara

Title: The Company You Keep

Title: Flammen & Citronen

Title: Boobs: An American Obsession

Title: Murphy's Romance

Title: The Alpinist

Title: The Lady Vanishes

Title: Forces of Nature

Title: Mitt liv som hund

Title: 13 Ghosts

Title: The Soloist

Title: Blue Hawaii

Title: In Hell

Title: The Emerald Forest

Title: Game On

Title: Just Cause

Title: All That Heaven Allows

Title: The Angel

Title: Triple Threat

Title: Untamed Heart

Title: Hollywoodland

Description: A detective examines the mysterious death ofGeorge Reeves, the star of the television seriesAdventures of Superman(1952).

Title: Titas Ekti Nadir Naam

Title: Bowling for Columbine

Title: Eunmilhagae euidaehagae

Title: Pamasahe

Title: The Fable

Title: Revenge of the Nerds II: Nerds in Paradise

Description: The rising college nerds set out to a convention in Florida, but are not welcomed by the Alpha Beta representatives.

Title: Deadly Friend

Title: Nordsjøen

Title: Trapped

Title: Dag II

Title: Delhi Belly
